TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlMethods extends System.Object
public ref class SqlMethods abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供對應至 SQL Server 函式的方法。

span.span: Provides methods that correspond to SQL Server functions.

summary.span: 只有 LINQ to SQL 查詢才支援 類別中的方法。

span.span: Methods in the class are only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.

summary.span: 計算兩個指定之日期間的日界限數。

span.span: Counts the number of day boundaries between two specified dates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 SQL Server`DATEDIFF`函式使用`day`來指定時間界限類型跨越。Corresponds to the SQL Server `DATEDIFF` function using `day` to specify the type of time boundary crossed. 如需這個 SQL Server 函式相關資訊，請參閱[DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql)。For more about this SQL Server function, see [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql).

.method public static hidebysig int32 DateDiffDay(valuetype System.DateTime startDate, valuetype System.DateTime endDate) cil managed
Public Shared Function DateDiffDay (startDate As DateTime, endDate As DateTime) As Integer
public: static int DateDiffDay(DateTime startDate, DateTime endDate);

span.span: The start date for the time period.
The end date for the time period.

summary.span: 計算兩個不可為 null 的日期之間的日界限數。

span.span: Counts the number of day boundaries between two non-nullable dates.

returns.span: 兩個指定之日期間的日界限數。

span.span: The number of day boundaries between the two specified dates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 SQL Server`DATEDIFF`函式使用`day`來指定時間界限類型跨越。Corresponds to the SQL Server `DATEDIFF` function using `day` to specify the type of time boundary crossed. 如需這個 SQL Server 函式相關資訊，請參閱[DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql)。For more about this SQL Server function, see [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql).

The end date for the time period.

summary.span: 計算兩個可為 null 的日期之間的日界限數。

span.span: Counts the number of day boundaries between two nullable dates.

returns.span: 當兩個參數都不是 時，傳回兩個指定之日期間的日界限數。

span.span: When both parameters are not , returns the number of day boundaries between the two specified dates.

returns.span: 當參數的其中一個或兩個都是 時，傳回 值。

span.span: When one or both parameters are , returns a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 SQL Server`DATEDIFF`函式使用`minute`來指定時間界限類型跨越。Corresponds to the SQL Server `DATEDIFF` function using `minute` to specify the type of time boundary crossed. 如需這個 SQL Server 函式相關資訊，請參閱[DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql)。For more about this SQL Server function, see [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對應至 SQL Server`DATEDIFF`函式使用`year`來指定時間界限類型跨越。Corresponds to the SQL Server `DATEDIFF` function using `year` to specify the type of time boundary crossed. 如需這個 SQL Server 函式相關資訊，請參閱[DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql)。For more about this SQL Server function, see [DATEDIFF](/sql/t-sql/functions/datediff-transact-sql).

summary.span: 判斷特定字元字串是否符合指定的模式。

span.span: Determines whether a specific character string matches a specified pattern.

summary.span: 目前只有 LINQ to SQL 查詢支援這個方法。

span.span: This method is currently only supported in LINQ to SQL queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server`LIKE`功能無法透過轉譯現有 common language runtime (CLR) 和.NET Framework 建構，並不支援 LINQ to SQL 內容之外。The SQL Server `LIKE` functionality cannot be exposed through translation of existing common language runtime (CLR) and .NET Framework constructs, and is unsupported outside of a LINQ to SQL context. 使用 LINQ to SQL 之外這個方法一律會擲回例外狀況型別的。The use of this method outside of LINQ to SQL will always throw an exception of type .

span.span: The string to be searched for a match.

param.name: pattern
param.span: 要在 matchExpression 中比對的模式，可能會包含萬用字元。

param.name: escapeCharacter
param.span: 放在萬用字元之前的字元，表示它應解譯為一般字元，而非萬用字元。

span.span: The character to put in front of a wildcard character to indicate that it should be interpreted as a regular character and not as a wildcard character.
